feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Ariba Buying and Invoicing
feed.subtitle: SAP Ariba Buying and Invoicing Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: SAP Ariba supplier accounts
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I have one query related to supplier accounts on SAP Business network, where supplier A have multiple contacts like X,Y,Z.... but supplier A already connected with customer ABC with supplier contact X, so that in SLP 360 for supplier A , only one contact X is showing public other contacts Y,Z are showing private.

Here my question is, when a customer ABC invite a supplier A with contact Y for sourcing event, whether he needs to create another account to complete sourcing event or he use existing account to access event.

what If he create another account, the ANID will be same or different?

I believe that one supplier have one ANID which connect all supplier contacts.

entry.title: Does Ariba buying allows to have same PO number associated with different PRs of Ariba?
entry.content:
The Ariba Buying realm needs to be connected to two different ERPs system ids. The number ranges for PO are same for both system ids. This will done through custom routing in CIG.

What happens when same PO number is generated from both the ERPs for different PRs that we create in Ariba?

Does Ariba buying allows to same PO number associated different PRs of Ariba?

entry.title: I want to become SAP MM & Ariba consultant.
entry.content:
Hello All, 

I want to become SAP MM & Ariba consultant. 

What is pathway to learn from scratch, please anyone guide for me 
How can i grow in this field ? in this field have bright future & salary ? 
Is there any recommended video/ you tube channel for learning. 

Currently i have basis experience  in SAP MM & Ariba.  

thank you for your answer.

entry.title: Digital Certificate authotication for SAP Ariba
entry.content:
Hallo Experts,

I am looking to post cxml invoice from postman through digital certificate authentication for testing. But the challenge is as per Ariba, the certificate has to be procured from SAP Ariba trusted company. As I am looking for testing purpose, I would like know is there any possible to get digital certificate for testing so that I can test from Postman application and later conclude for procuring.

entry.title: How do I hide unit prices in Guided Buying?
entry.content:
Colleagues, 

I am afraid I know the answer but "one who asks does not err" as they say ;+)

One of my customers asked a question on if it is possible to hide unit prices from Guided Buying users view. The motivation is simple and easy to understand - being a laboratory services provider, they want to secure their negotiated prices from being passed around by Guided Buying users. I am as well aware that it is easy to challenge - almost every user of any procurement related system on chosen step of buying process may have access to the prices giving invoices, reports, or S/4HANA access for finance as the first examples.

So my question - did any you guys ever met such customer requirement and if you ever heard of how to cover it?

Thank you ion advance. 

Marcin

entry.title: sap a]Ariba integration with Sap Business one
entry.content:
Please expert, In an SAP Ariba integration with SAP Business one. 

The procurement process typically starts with an RFQ. Which system initiates this?

Please can someone also assist with a simple architecture diagram of the integration

entry.title: Ariba CIG Target Value Variable mapping
entry.content:
Hello,
I’m currently exploring CIG mappings and testing various configurations to deepen my understanding. I need your help in understanding the difference between Target Position Variable and Target Value Variable in mapping.

I’m particularly confused about the purpose and usage of the Target Value Variable what it actually does and how it should be used in mappings.

Could you please explain this with a simple and easy-to-understand example? Also, please let me know for which document types this mapping is applicable so I can test it accordingly.

Looking forward to your guidance.

entry.title: What changes needs to be made in Ariba (Inculding AN and CIG) when a new company is added in SAP ECC
entry.content: My customer has came up with a requirement to add a new company code in SAP ECC, which is integrated with Ariba all master data and workflows are maintained in SAP ECC and are imported into Ariba. could you please let me know which additional files, templates or configuration need to be reviewed or updated on the Ariba side for this change?

entry.title: No Assignment Group in Ariba CIM for central Invoice Management App
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I'm currently struggling with the "assignment group" filter in the app "Manage Supplier Invoices Centrally". 
I have been able to synchronize the users from our Cloud Identity Service. I also created two groups specially meant for Arbia CIM in our IAS, that both start with CIM_ as a group name. I assigned the corresponding users to those two groups and tried to replicate the users and groups to our Ariba CIM system.

Unfortunately, the groups are not synchronized. Am I missing something in our transformation tab? I have copied the JSON file from SAP help. The groups block is always framed with an orange line.

Thank you so much for your help.

Christian

entry.title: Impact of activating the following Business Functions
entry.content:
Hi.

Does anyone know the impact of activating the following business functions? Or know how to analyze it?

LOG_MM_P2PSE_1

ESOA_OPS01
LOG_ESOA_OPS_2
LOG_MM_CI_2

Will it have an effect on the current Prod transactions? system performance?

Thank you.

entry.title: Showing wrong attachment document in SAP MM
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We are currently using Ariba Sourcing integrated with SAP. After completing a sourcing project, we push the quote to the external system, which automatically generates a Purchase Order (PO) and reflects it against the respective Purchase Requisition (PR).

However, we’ve encountered an issue with the documents attached to the PO. Although the document name appears correctly (especially the “Approval PO” document), when we open the file, it displays a different document than expected.

This mismatch is causing confusion and delays, as we have to manually verify each document to ensure the correct one is released. This increases the risk of releasing incorrect documents.

Request:
Please advise on how we can resolve this issue or if there is a configuration or technical fix available to ensure the correct document is linked and displayed in the PO.

Looking forward to your support.

  SAP Ariba Sourcing   SAP Ariba Spend Analysis   SAP Business Network for Procurement and SAP Business Network for Supply Chain   MM (Materials Management)

entry.title: Using SAP Ariba SNAP Buying as a punch-out catalog from SAP Central Procurement
entry.content:
Hello Experts!

I am reaching out to you with my customer questions on which solutions to use under below mentioned conditions. 

Customer uses SAP ECC as a connected system, SAP Central Procurement On-Premise as a hub system.

Central Procurement is meant to be a central "console" for procurement activities and has static and punch-out catalogs (CP) connected. 

Now, Customer wants to add SAP Ariba SNAP Buying  to this puzzle and use it as a punch-out from SAP CP for to upgrade UI experience among users. Important - Guided Buying created cart will be transferred to SAP CP,  than to SAP ECC backend approved and sent with the regular PO sending functionality by SAP ECC.    

What toolset do I need: 

SAP Ariba Catalog + SAP CP

SAP Ariba SNAP Buying + SAP CP?

SAP Ariba SNAP Buying + SAP Ariba Catalog + SAP CP?

 

Thank you in advance. 

Have a great weekend,

Marcin

entry.title: Postman to call the Ariba Web Service ServiceSheetExport SOAP API, authentication fail
entry.content:
We followed this sap official document to configure it but it did not work.we have created End Point with  basic authorization and type is Outbound .Integration Configuration  we enabled it. and also get the WSDL file. then call the API by postman. response is 401 bad credentials.

This link is below. page 18~page 21

soap.pdf

help me look into the reason?

Has anyone successfully called the Ariba soap API using Postman?

entry.title: 'DeltaStockRequest' payload link content
entry.content:
Hi Experts. 

I am reaching out to you with a question on peculiar S4 <-> SAP Ariba behavior. 

My Customer turned on inventory reservation between their S/4HANA Private Cloud and SAP Ariba Buying. After a while they noticed that "some" system is trying to send "DeltaStockRequest" to SAP Ariba and these are stopped on SAP IS (transactions status 'failed'.

As far as the document itself is easy to explain with SAP Help - https://help.sap.com/docs/ariba/what-s-new-in-ariba-cloud-integration-gateway-2003-q1-2020-release-guide/functional-and-technical-changes-for-integration-to-support-displaying-unrestricted-stock-inventory-in-sap-ariba-procurement-solutions?q=DeltaStockRequest&locale=en-US&version=LATEST -  what causes a serious doubts is the content of the link shown in payload: 

<DeltaStockRequest xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" realmId="MyCustomersRealmID" systemId="QODCLNT002" transactionId="1733530145806" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="file:/C:/My_Work/CIG_ADDON_2018.12/DeltaStock.xsd"/>

I know there are similar cases in SAP Community but none of these explains:

- why there are some 'dummy' systems IDs 'hardcoded' in the link content,

- even if we agree that this is a 'dummy' link to be filled in with real system data - why isn't it the same for all cases? 

Do any of you  know a "bulletproof" explanation for it?

Thank you in advance!!

entry.title: Ariba - SLP and Buying and Invoicing - are there WSDLs to integrate Master Data with other ERPs?
entry.content:
Ariba - SLP and Buying and Invoicing - are there WSDLs to integrate Master Data with other ERPs?

We need to integrate as well as monitor the outcome of the integrations for master data. We have a custom field whose data is brought over using the master data/import batch data and will need to be sending data to Ariba at least every 5 minutes.
I know there are the manual csv file options. this seems very clunky and archaic for the year 2025.  Are there web services available so this can be automated or i guess how are other non-SAP companies automating the data feeds?

Thanks!

entry.title: Ariba invoice notifications- multiple emails
entry.content:
Hello,

We are seeing 100 of duplicate emails sent out this morning from Ariba for invoice approval.

Has anyone seen similar issues today?

Thanks

entry.title: How to configure automatic Good Receipt for a Condition Value of Total Order Amount?
entry.content:
Hello,

I am trying to configure automatic goods receipts in SAP Ariba for a client that demands setting up the Automatic receiving for different Total Order Amount values threshold for different company codes.

I have put the following fields in the Condition Value 1 - Requisition.TotalCost.Amount AND Requisition.CompanyCode.UniqueName in Condition Value 2 fields.

However, how do I configure in the Excel (ReceiptByCommodityCode.csv) that the Total Amount of the PR should be less than this value that I put in this column?

entry.title: Approval flow should trigger in Ariba when 'Ship To' field is changed in Requisition next versions
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Could you please help us with the following?

When a Purchase Requisition (PR) is fully ordered, and the requester/preparer makes changes to the "Ship To" field in next Versions of the PR, the approval flow should be triggered in the subsequent versions.

We would like the PO Admin group to appear in the approval flow whenever requester/preparer makes changes to Ship To" field in next Versions of the PR changes are made in the changed PO.

entry.title: Ariba SOX Audit
entry.content:
Hi,

How are other people managing the auditing of Ariba? In our company Ariba is a SOX application and so we have twice yearly internal and external audits. 

Due to the Ariba role structure, our support team need Customer Admin access pretty much all the time to help with with ticket. Customer Admin is an auditable role and so we must download and review the audit logs regularly, we also must make screenshots of the download because the audit logs themselves do not make it clear which environment and date range have been used in their creation. 

The download of logs and evidence and the review of this is very time consuming, how are other people doing this please?

entry.title: SAP Business Network Buyer Purchase Order template/layout
entry.content:
Hi,

I am looking for the purchase order templates stored in our company's Ariba Network buyer account. 

Can somebody guide me as an administrator, where can I find the template that the business network uses to generat PO from buyer account? 

We need to look into the fields and locations of each section and would need to amend some of those.

Thank you,
